Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan need to pick themselves back up after the defeat against India
Canada finds themselves in an unusual position of looking down the table at their more fancied opponents
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan need to do the heavy-lifting up top
Nicholas Kirton has shown the personality and quality to perform on the big stage
Saim Ayub may have a shout of returning to the side, which leaves one of Usman Khan or Shadab vulnerable to the drop
Miscellaneous Highlights: A fresh pitch is expected to be used for the Canada-Pakistan clash
Rain delayed the start of the India-Pakistan clash in New York
